edu.jhu.cs.oose.biblio.gui
Interface FilePreviewVisitor

All Known Implementing Classes:
FilePreviewFactory.PreviewConstructor
public interface FilePreviewVisitor

A visitor class used to construct Preview Panels. There should be one method on this for each kind of PreviewPanel. Each FileMetadata implementation should know which one to call.

Method Summary
 PreviewPanel makeEpubPreviewPanel(EpubFileMetadata data, Bookmark bkmk)
          Creates a PreviewPanel capable of displaying an Epub file
 PreviewPanel makePDFPreviewPanel(PDFFileMetadata data, Bookmark bkmk)
          Creates a PreviewPanel capable of displaying a PDF file
 

Method Detail

makePDFPreviewPanel

PreviewPanel makePDFPreviewPanel(PDFFileMetadata data,
                                 Bookmark bkmk)
Creates a PreviewPanel capable of displaying a PDF file

Parameters:
data - the file to display
bkmk - the place in the file to preview
Returns:
a PreviewPanel capable of displaying a PDF file

makeEpubPreviewPanel

                                  Bookmark bkmk)
Creates a PreviewPanel capable of displaying an Epub file

Parameters:
data - the file to display
bkmk - the location in the file to preview

a PreviewPanel capable of displaying an Epub file
